In order to do so, your entire data set:
In order to do so, your entire data set will have to be encrypted and synchronized, so it is best to run it overnight.

To start, please follow these instructions:

1. Synchronize all your devices.
2. Click "%s".
3. Let it run to completion. While it runs, avoid changing any note on your other devices, to avoid conflicts.
4. Once sync is done on this device, sync all your other devices and let it run to completion.

Important: you only need to run this ONCE on one device.
Disabling encryption means *all* your no: Disabling encryption means *all* your notes and attachments are going to be re-synchronized and sent unencrypted to the sync target. Do you wish to continue?
The Web Clipper needs your authorisation: The Web Clipper needs your authorization to access your data.
Joplin can synchronise your notes using: Joplin can synchronize your notes using various providers. Select one from the list below.
In order to use file system synchronisat: In order to use file system synchronization your permission to write to external storage is required.
